events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund for it.
The customer's request has been categorized as a Refund case due to the request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund process for the incorrect jacket size.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the sizing issue. I’m here to help you get a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the size you received so I can verify the order details for the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the size I got is XL, but I ordered a Medium.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated a full refund for your order. You will also receive a prepaid label to return the jacket at no cost.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and the refund process started right away.
The refund request has been processed and the return shipping label sent to the customer's email as confirmation of resolution.
Checking in to confirm you have successfully sent the jacket back and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed after confirmation of refund completion and return shipment received.
